mapper.insert:
replace into tb_site_message(id, sender_id, receiver_id, chirper_id, type, create_time, is_read) values
( #{message.id}, #{message.senderId}, #{message.receiverId}, #{message.chirperId}, #{message.type} , #{message.createTime} , #{message.isRead} )
mapper.select:
select id, sender_id, receiver_id, chirper_id, type, create_time from tb_site_message tsm
where tsm.receiver_id = #{id} order by create_time desc
select id, sender_id, receiver_id, chirper_id, type, create_time from tb_site_message where receiver_id = #{id} and is_read = 0 order by create_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into tb_site_message(id, sender_id, receiver_id, chirper_id, type, create_time, is_read) SELECT temp.id, s_id, tc.author_id, c_id, tp, c_t, i_r from (select #{id} as id, #{senderId} as s_id, #{chirperId} as c_id, #{type} as tp, #{createTime} as c_t, #{isRead} as i_r) temp join tb_chirper tc on temp.c_id = tc.id
